body.name: Twinklady Rain Jacket Women Windbreaker Striped Climbing Raincoats Waterproof Lightweight Outdoor Hooded Trench Coats
features: 【Waterproof Rain Jacket keep you dry all the time】---Suitable for your hiking,climbing,traveling,camping,sport outdoor,easy to quick-drying when it is light rain or snow and wind.

【Lightweight perfet for trip or casual wear】---Rain Jacket Womens Long sleeve with hooded, adjustable drawstring waist design. Button and zipper front closure raincoat, fully stripes Lined and The Raincoat has 3 side pockets are a good size to hold all kinds of things, it covers the hips, and the hood is generous but doesn't overdo it.Attached Cotton Lined Hood with Adjustable Drawstrings give it a real styled look.

【Hooded detachable and Functional pocket 】---Lightweight Rain Jacket is detachable hood,you can wear it when it is raining or big wind or as a fashion element.you can remove the hooded to have a simple raincoat.
【Stylish Striped Linning Design】---Rain Jacket Womens Waterproof with Hood is made of 100% Polyster so it is not strechy, but runs a little big, you can wear t-shirt or sweater inside

【Women Raincoats Garement Care】---Hand-wash, Dry Clean, Do not machine wash, Machine wash easily damage the waterproof fabric. Please Refer to Our Size Chart in Product Description (Not the Amazon size chart)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am 5'8", 145 pounds. I ordered a medium. It fits perfectly and allows me to wear a sweater underneath. It is a great, lightweight coat. Perfect for Arizona winters. Great price and really cute. Love that the hood can detach and the striped lining is nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is very nice. It is well constructed and very flattering. The zipper and snaps are good quality. The fabric is light weight and at the same time sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not true to color
reviews.reviewText: The color is a deeper red, not as bright. I personally love it, but it’s good to know. That’s why I took a star off.Fits great, very comfortable and cute. I love the size of the pockets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this jacket so much, I have purchased three of this color and one green. The green one’s zipper broke, and it was too late for return, so I am stuck with that one, and the snaps broke on one pocket. . My only other thing is that, of the other three red ones, they all fit a little differently, even though they are all the same size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this raincoat. It is light weight and good for rain with your rain boots.True to size too. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Color was not the same as pictured - more of a maroon tint. Quality of fabric was subpar. More of a windbreaker than rain coat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I adore this jacket. Cute and keeps me dry. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great looking coat but NOT waterproof
reviews.reviewText: The coat style is nice and I like it very much the way it looks. I got the yellow color, which I find nice and happy color in gloomy rainy days. The coat is very comfortable and has nice large pockets and a nice lining. I was looking for a lightweight coat that I could wear all year round since I don't like heavy coats and even less getting wet in rainy days. Particularly good is the fact that this coat has a nice hood that covers well and can be made snug with cord adjustments. The hood is very well made, and also a positive thing for me is the fact that it has a small visor-type front that protects my eyeglasses from getting wet. I was looking forward to wearing this coat when I walk my dog as it would allow me walk in the rain without having to carry an umbrella. The first time I wore the coat it was raining quite heavily, I was out 30 minutes but under the coat my clothes stayed dry. But from the second time onwards, this coat did no longer protect me from the rain, and each time I wore it without an umbrella I got completely drenched in water. I must say I am a quite disappointed by the fact that the description said it is a waterproof coat because obviously it is not waterproof. I assume the material might have been sprayed with some type of solution to make it water resistant - though not waterproof - but that after one use it had worn off. I think this coat was shipped from China so returning it was not an option, so I may still use the it when I am able to also bring my umbrella with me but otherwise I'll have to shop for a new coat that is really waterproof hence my disappointment with it and my only 1 star rating.

I’m not wowed by this coat but it will serve its purpose.It looks heavier but is actually very light. I like the striped interior and sleeve cuffs. Sleeves are long but when you fold them up, that’s when the contrasting stripes are seen. The overall length of the coat is good.The waist tie is actually very high on me, a good 2-3” above my waist, and I think it should be on the inside, but inside, or outside, I wish it had those little locking clips to keep it where you set it.It is very wrinkled when taken out of the package so I’ll have to steam and/or iron itI bought this coat nearly a year ago ago and I still have not worn it - I should’ve returned it. Maybe I’ll wear it this Fall

reviews.reviewTitle: Cute jacket, fits true to size
reviews.reviewText: Fits true to size. Thinner than expected but overall I am happy with it. You can roll up the cuffs to expose the stripes on the inside. Has a draw string in the back to cinch the waist in. Haven’t worn it in the rain yet but material feels like it could protect you in the rain.
Buen producto únicamente la tela está más delgada de lo que esperaba
Beautiful fit overall, although maybe a little bit. Great quality.
Love it! It’s too nice for walking the dog but that’s all I seem to do lately!
